Our main intention is to gain our customer’s trust and make them a secure and win-win shopping experience. We may not be the best but we are trying hard to be the best.

item.title: Wool Socks
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row background_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1466590694922{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="50"][textbox title="Features" title_color="#262626" title_fontsize="24" text_content="Vitrine is the shop theme you have been always looking for, it is versatile, it is flexible and it is fast. Donec partu commodo a at erat nostra auctor sodales faucibus vestibulum adipiscing senectus." content_fontsize="13" text_content_color="#707070"][vc_empty_space height="37"][textbox title="Details" title_color="#262626" title_fontsize="24" text_content="Various options including, Gallery, Portfolio, creative design items, price tables and supreme shop features. By having Vitrine you'll never need another shop theme, our theme is probably the best shop theme of 2016." content_fontsize="13" text_content_color="#707070"][vc_empty_space height="50"][vc_empty_space height="90"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1466591114849{padding-left: -50px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="90"][vc_tta_accordion active_section="-50"][vc_tta_section title="VITRINE" tab_id="1461138110921-473a7543-8dbe"][vc_column_text]A responsive, feature rich shop, suitable for medium to large sized bussinesses[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="UPDATES" tab_id="1461138111055-332b12da-6b69"][vc_column_text]Simple yet elegant design which lets you to make most of the effort you are spending and helps you to sell more[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="SUPPORT" tab_id="1467547154142-0f10c7ff-f005"][vc_column_text]By buying Vitrin not only benefit from lifetime updates but constant upgrading. It means that if you need a feature, we will consider adding it as soon as possible, if you are not the only one that needs it (a few customers like you requested it) we will add this to our theme immediately.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][vc_empty_space height="90"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: cotton Socks
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1466572147639{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="50"][textbox title="Features" title_color="#262626" title_fontsize="24" text_content="To be able to use this durable product, you need to clean it regurarely and use it appropriately. The item is produced from the highest quality of material that was available to the manufacturer. Its famous brand is also a good reason for you to rely on the perfectness of it." content_fontsize="13" text_content_color="#707070"][vc_empty_space height="15px"][vc_column_text]

Details

  • - Wash and clean gently to avoid damage.
  • - Order the product 3-4 days before your due date.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Sizing

To find suitable size for your body measurements go here.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="90"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1466572981768{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="37"][vc_tta_accordion active_section="-50"][vc_tta_section title="VITRINE" tab_id="1461138110921-473a7543-8dbe"][vc_column_text]Vitrine is the shop theme you have been always looking for, it is versatile, it is flexible and it is fast. It has the features that you may have only of you use a commercial theme or if you hire an expert to create every feature you want.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="UPDATES" tab_id="1461138111055-332b12da-6b69"][vc_column_text]By buying Vitrin not only benefit from lifetime updates but constant upgrading. It means that if you need a feature, we will consider adding it as soon as possible, if you are not the only one that needs it (a few customers like you requested it) we will add this to our theme immediately.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="SUPPORT" tab_id="1461138195992-e924049e-5737"][vc_column_text]Our theme comes with 6 months free and unlimited support, our support forum and our support agent made sure of that. There are many ways that you can contact our support team we enen have twitter, facebook, Behance and pinterest accounts for this.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: woven hat
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_color="#f8f8f8"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1466572147639{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="50"][textbox title="Review" title_color="#262626" title_fontsize="24" text_content="Silky soft fabric, permanent colorful colors, stylish design and amazing sewing work are the things that you are going to pay for when you decide to buy this item, Chanel makes you look elegant and chic effortlessly and you may benefit from their custom design policy ." content_fontsize="13" text_content_color="#707070"][vc_empty_space height="15px"][vc_column_text]

Details

  • - high quality fabric as well as colors
  • - All sewing works are done by experts
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Sizing

To find suitable size for you please use our size guide here.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="90"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1466572981768{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="50"][textbox title="What to expect?" title_color="#262626" title_fontsize="24" text_content="The item will arrive two to three days after the final purchase at your door. There will be an orange package that would be completely sealed and it also would be covered in a plastic bag to make sure that it is waterproof. Do not accept packages send in our name unless they are exactly as they were described." content_fontsize="13" text_content_color="#707070"][vc_empty_space height="30px"][iconbox_left title="CREATIVE DESIGN" title_color="#282828" content_text="This is one of 2016 best seller items worldwide, the resources are limited so if you plan to order, do it ASAP." content_color="#787878" icon="earth" icon_color="#01558f" icon_animation="fade-in-left" icon_animation_delay="200"][vc_empty_space height="15px"][iconbox_left title="BUDGET FRIENDLY" title_color="#282828" content_text="This chick design is adopted by one of the most popular brands in France and its fabric is imported from Italy." content_color="#787878" icon="bag" icon_color="#01558f" icon_animation="fade-in-left" icon_animation_delay="300"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

The item is produced from the highest quality of material that was available to the manufacturer. Its famous brand is also a good reason for you to rely on the perfectness of it." content_fontsize="13" text_content_color="#707070"][vc_empty_space height="15px"][vc_column_text]

  • - Order the product 3-4 days before your due date.
